(Heat/Fire [fire], Armor Piercing [armorpiercing], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 10F to forge (F2)

This ornate mace looks expensive enough to be used by a king. When the mace hits something a sea of flames will burst from it and burn its target as well as anyone nearby.
